::Savanna::
"Oh Sure HotRod. Just tell them that the base is unguarded. Why not 
invite them to tea. I'm sure they'd just love some tea and cake." She 
rolled her eyes at him and growled at the Preds.
"OK, Since you won't just come out and tell us what it is you want, 
let's try a different approach."  She jumped up and grabbed on to the 
lead Pred's chest armor and held on so she was nose to nose with the 
Pred. "OK, Now, PLEASE tell me why you are here and what your 
intended porpose for the Ark is." She was growling slightly as she 
spoke. Her claws holding her up so she was eye to eye with the Pred.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit hoped they would reach the target soon, his drill was 
almost to
> dull to cut through.
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "Hot Rod, maximize." Hot Rod turns to bot mode.
> "We're not going anywhere untill you tell us you're buissness at the
> Ark." Hot Rod thought for a sec.
> "If you're looking for bots, there is nobody there."
